- Emotional risk - you have no idea what the person will say or what they will do with the information. - Safety risk - if you suffered violence or do not feel safe around this person, confrontation, even over email or text, can aggravate a dangerous situation. - What you say to them may be used against you if you do choose to tell your school or the police, etc. - This might be encouraging for some perpetrators who desire to cause harm and may enjoy hearing that they have done so..
